desc: My name is Nikki, a joint student at Bryn Mawr College and UPENN, looking for an app developer to help pursue a passion project. My idea would be to create an app called "Electrigo." I want to be the first person to jump on the bandwagon to create an app specifically for a niche target audience- people who own electric cars. This app, using a combination of ideas from apps like Waze and GasBuddy, would calculate the mileage used/left in coordination with type of car to advise the driver on which gas station to go to. I hope to help drivers find the most affordable gas station efficiently but also create a market for electric cars specifically. There is no app out there targeted towards electric cars. My main goal of the app, and a limitation due to driving laws, is to also send notifications to the driver informing them if an electric charge station is nearby and which one would be the cheapest to drive to. My target audience would be consumers with iPhones and I hope to implement this project within 6 months.
title: Design an App: Accessible Gas Stations (Specifically Electric cars)
